705368f-a.title: Brooklyn: Lafayette Avenue - Classon Avenue
705368f-a.text:
Lafayette Avenue, north Tide, between Classon Avenue anc
Emerson Tlace, showing Public -chool No. 43.
Board of Education of the City of New York October 3, 1929
CREDIT LITE IMPEEATIVE

703613f-b.title: Brooklyn: Classon Avenue - Lafayette Avenue
703613f-b.text:
Classon Ave., west side, north from No. 322, just north of Lafayette
Ave. The 88th precinck No. 298 Classon Ave. is in the building
displaying the flag. The buiiding in the foreground, at left,
partially seen was rased in 1928.
1923.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
(2)
The same, another view.
1923.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.

705370f-a.title: Brooklyn: Lafayette Avenue - Classon Avenue
705370f-a.text:
Lafayette Avenue, north side, west from Classon Avenue, showing
Public School No 45. View 2 shows the northeast cenner of
Lafayette and Steuben Street.
P. L. Sperr  View 1: Auaust 24, 1941
